item.title: InvalidSObjectFault INVALID_TYPE - Managed Package - Partner API - License Issue
item.description: Creating this entry as the only useful article I found to debug this issue was a comment, on a blog post, from 2013 (Link below) Scenario: Use the Partner API to update a custom field, on a custom object, installed via a managed package. While the integration flow worked correctly in developer sandboxes - Production flow was throwing an error that had not been seen in testing: [InvalidSObjectFault [ApiQueryFault [ApiFault exceptionCode='INVALID_TYPE' exceptionMessage='CUSTOMFIELD_C FROM MANAGED_PACKAGE_OBJECT__C WHERE EXTIDFIELD__C ERROR at Row:1:Column:41 sObject type 'MANAGED_PACKAGE_OBJECT__C' is not supported.
